name: Food Fighter: Hansa
description:
My old entry for Gain Jam 2018, titled "Hansa and the Festival" officially uploaded here as a prototype, one day the idea might be revisted but many mechanics have spread to later projects.

It's a short (3-8min) collect-a-thon with 2 endings based on how much you collect.

The main character hansa will transform as you collect and you are able to summon 3 companions on your quest be collecting the special powerups.

What was meant to be test here was dynamic enemies, goblin enemies spawn in with differing body types and most of them will transform if you use the feeding skill.
